author: James Van Straten, AI Boost
title: The Blockchain Group Buys Nearly $70M Worth of Bitcoin, Boosting Total Holdings to 1,471 BTC
description: Major capital operations fuel acquisition valued at 60.2 million euros, leading to an impressive BTC yield of 1,097.6% YTD.
content:
The Blockchain Group (ALTBG), listed on Euronext Growth Paris and known as Europes first bitcoin 
 treasury company, has bought 624 BTC for approximately 60.2 million euros ($68.8 million). This mov… [+709 chars]
